title: Cinesamples - CineStrings CORE [KONTAKT]
description:
=======[ Info ]======================================================================

Product: CineStrings CORE
Vendor: CineSamples
Format: Kontakt 5.3
Website: cinesamples.com/products/cinestrings

The CineStrings CORE Library is CinesamplesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ orchestral string sample library for Kontakt. Recorded at the world famous SONY Pictures Scoring Stage in Los Angeles, and mixed by veteran legend Dennis Sands (Spiderman, Argo, Avengers, Back to the Future, Forrest Gump, Shawshank Redemption, American Beauty, and 250+ more). The CineStrings CORE Library covers the essentials of the orchestral string section, and functions as a foundation in any scoring pallette.

=======[ Instruction ]===============================================================

For Kontakt 5.3 (and above)

--- [ METHOD I ] ---

- Open Kontakt 5.3 (and above)
- Go to File tab
- Browse for the torrent folder
- Drag n Drop the NKI files into the Right Panel to use.

--- [ METHOD II ] ---

- Go to Library tab
- Click Add Library
- Browse for the library folder's location
- Click Ok/Yes
- Accept or Yes when asked
